mappings.description: Implements the plugin package format specification from PRD section 5.1
Implements the plugin.json manifest schema from PRD section 5.1
Implements the plugin package extraction and validation from PRD sections 5.2 and 6.1
Implements the DLL loading functionality from PRD sections 5.4 and 6.1
Implements the plugin host interface from PRD section 5.4
Implements the plugin host functionality from PRD sections 5.4 and 6.1
Implements the permission system from PRD sections 5.6 and 6.2
Implements the plugin management functionality from PRD sections 5.2, 5.3, 5.6 and user stories US1, US2, US3
Implements the Tauri commands for UI integration from PRD section 5.5 and user stories US1, US3
Implements the UI components from PRD sections 5.5, 6.4 and user stories US1, US3
Implements the security features from PRD section 6.2 and user story US4
Implements the test suite from PRD section 8 and user story US5
Implements the CI/CD pipeline from PRD section 8 and user story US5
Creates sample plugins as specified in PRD section 9
Creates developer documentation as specified in PRD section 10
